com.ubudu.sdk

Class UbuduBeaconManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduAreaManager
      • com.ubudu.sdk.UbuduBeaconManager

  • public class UbuduBeaconManager
extends UbuduAreaManager
    Interface represents beacons' manager.

      • setBeaconLifeTimeMillis

        public void setBeaconLifeTimeMillis(long lifetime)
        Sets the lifetime of the beacon being ranged. If there is no new scan of the beacon during this time span the beacon is treated as lost and deleted from ranged beacons. Default value is 6 seconds. Note: It may be necessary to customize this value if scan and between scan periods are customized and set to be long.
        Parameters:
        lifetime - lifetime of the beacon in milliseconds

      • setRangedBeaconsNotifier

        public void setRangedBeaconsNotifier(UbuduRangedBeaconsNotifier notifier)
        Sets the notifier which will be called when beacons are ranged within the proximity UUID set in the Ubudu SDK.
        Parameters:
        notifier - notifier instance to be added to the UbuduBeaconManager

      • removeRangedBeaconsNotifier

        public boolean removeRangedBeaconsNotifier(UbuduRangedBeaconsNotifier notifier)
        Removes the notifier from the manager.
        Parameters:
        notifier - notifier instance to be removed
        Returns:
        true if notifier was successfully removed, false otherwise (e.g. if given notifier does not exist in the manager's list).

      • setActivityJsonLogEnabled

        public void setActivityJsonLogEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Parameters:
        enabled - activity json log file enabled flag

      • setActivityJsonLogBatteryStateUpdatePeriod

        public void setActivityJsonLogBatteryStateUpdatePeriod(long periodmillis)
        Sets the period of logging the battery state to the Ubudu-SDK activity JSON log file. Period must be greater than 0 ms.
        Parameters:
        periodmillis - battery state update period

      • managerKey

        public java.lang.String managerKey()
        Returns:
        manager key String. `B` is for UbuduBeaconManager, `G` is for UbuduGeofenceManager.
